name: How can wallets deal with the multichain nightmare?
description: Multichain token transfers are broken. Keystore contracts are one way of solving the identity problem of token transfers in a multichain environment.  We at Peanute have proposed an alternative solution that relies on offchain messages; it is more user-friendly and does not require the middleware stack or wallets to be rebuilt. Let's talk through pro's and con's of multiple approaches.

speakers.name: Konrad Urban
speakers.bio: Konrad is the co-founder of Peanut Protocol. He is interested in intents, identity, and real-life use cases for decentralisation. He likes collaborating and wants to build things with you.
